Reviews.Content: Good little hotel - not a 5 star in the US/Canada sense, but a nice hotel Nice little hotel. Free Wireless internet in all the rooms. Good little conference room to use as well.Onsite bar and restaurant are nice - food is good and staff are great.Rooms aren't super fantastic, but adequate.
Reviews.Author: Jonesy33

Reviews.Content: Beautiful, cozy, spotless, excellent restaurant and bar!!!!! Great for the price! Just around the corner from Avenida Insurgentes (main thoroughfare with very good eateries, stores, bars. Quiet and elegant). Wonderful and courteous service. Excellent restaurant, very good menu, and cozy bar. Clean sheets  towels every night!
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
